title: Trump Backs Off Greenland Tariffs Threat
description: President Donald Trump announced Wednesday on social media that he would refrain from imposing tariffs on goods from European nations opposing his effort to take possession of Greenland, citing a “framework of a future deal." Mike McKee reports. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: President Donald Trump announced Wednesday on social media that he would refrain from imposing tariffs on goods from European nations opposing his effort to take possession of Greenland, citing a “framework of a future deal." Mike McKee reports. (Source: Bloomberg)
